content: I have expertise in JavaScript stacks, both front-end and back-end, but I am always curious and ready to learn and explore new technologies.
With 10 years of experience, I have a deep understanding of the development process, from ideation to production deployment.
I also believe that the best solutions come from collaboration and open communication, and I am dedicated to working closely with my clients to understand their needs and exceed their expectations.
about_me.title: About me

catch: I enjoy solving complex technical problems while delivering premium user-friendly applications.
catch2: When I’m not coding, you can find me at my favorite CrossFit box, probably doing burpees, or outside with my dog, trying to maintain a healthy work-life balance.

contact.catch: Let’s connect and discuss your project!
contact.prose: If you’re looking for a developer who is passionate about their work and committed to delivering high-quality applications, then look no further.
contact.title: Contact

experiences.derniercri_2012: I worked with JavaScript and Ruby on Rails to optimize the quality of our deliverables.
experiences.derniercri_2014: I contributed to the success of startups by applying my skills to their most ambitious projects.
experiences.derniercri_2021: I am responsible for the satisfaction of startups by turning their ideas into digital reality, one pixel at a time!
experiences.neuronalys_2019: By working on artificial intelligence systems and building performant and aesthetic web interfaces, I had the opportunity to push the boundaries of our technologies.
experiences.op1c_2013: I brought to life our clients’social media dreams by creating quality code, allowing them to stand out and quickly achieve their goals.
experiences.title: Experiences

iam: Hi, I’m Matthieu, a full-stack developer specializing in web and mobile.
